§ 787. Repealed. June 25, 1948, ch. 645, § 21, 62 Stat. 862
Section, R.S. §§ 4746, 4766; acts July 7, 1898, ch. 578, 30 Stat. 718; Aug. 17, 1912, ch. 301, § 1, 37 Stat. 312; July 3, 1930, ch. 863, § 2, 46 Stat. 1016, related to false certification of documents. See section 289 of Title 18, Crimes and Criminal Procedure.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal by act June 25, 1948, effective Sept. 1, 1948.
